CustomField.description: Line number for the Firm Order - if BriefName__r.ApplicationSource__c = 'SPO', value depends on brief quantity (example: if BriefName__r.SPO_SkuQuantity__c = 3, 3 firm orders will be created with LineNumber__c = 1, 2 or 3) - if BriefName__r.ApplicationSource__c = 'PERSO', value depends on products and their quantity (example: if 2 products are ordered with quantity =1 for Product1 and quantity=2 for Product2, 3 firm orders are created with LineNumber__c = 1, 2 or 3)
CustomField.label: Line Number
